# Blueprint Studio

> Blueprint Studio is a design and build studio that partners with companies to build their digital future. We offer end-to-end product design, development, branding, and AI engineering as a subscription service or project-based engagement.

## About

Blueprint Studio works with companies that have a great product but an underbuilt digital surface. We close the gap between product quality and digital presence.

Founded by Tyler Stupart and Jaidon Lalor. US-based, embedded in your tools and time zone.

## Services

- Product design and management
- UX/UI design
- Web and mobile development (frontend, backend, AI)
- Branding and graphic design
- Product videos and launch content
- Landing pages and digital surfaces

## Pricing

Two engagement models:

- **Design & Build Subscription**: $15k+/month. Dedicated expertise, unlimited requests, priority support, 48-hour delivery cycles. Pause or cancel anytime.
- **Project-Based**: Custom scope, fixed pricing, dedicated project management. Get a quote via intro call.

## How to Engage

- Book an intro call: https://cal.com/blueprint-studio/intro-call
